nodes.bodyText:
We try to avoid linking to the current branch as it periodically changes, which can break links.
Instead, you can use the {jsclient} attribute, which is branch-context aware. It expands to https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/client/javascript-api/<branch>. In this case, the <branch> would be master.

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                See https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/client/javascript-api/current/client-helpers.html[client.helpers.*]
          
          
            
                See {jsclient}/client-helpers.html[client.helpers.*]
